comments:

I am using Sun 1.6u1 as my vm if that helps any.

Michael, do you have a plug-in in your workspace that does not have a MANIFEST.MF?
yes I have 3 of them, jdt.debug.tests, ant.ui.tests, ant.core.tests.

After talking to Michael, he has not been able to reproduce the problem in recent I-builds.  Therefore, I am marking the bug as WorksForMe.

If we see this problem again, we can reopen the bug and restart the investigation.
